trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bend
There were no other sightings in Bend on or around January 9th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsJust 40 minutes ago saw in the sky a large organish bright light traveling NE. I thought it was the ISS, but from the reports ISS is not in this orbit area??? Please somebody debunk this for me?? This thing was huge! I saw a plane going the opposite direction and it was just a dot compared to this. Also it lasted about 2 minutes then quickly faded out. I have seen the ISS before and it was sort of in the same orbit, but did not fade out like this thing did! Also, it looked like a smaller object left from it in the west direction, but could have been a small satellite coincidently passing at the same time....would like to verify that!
Summary: Large Orange Bright light..I thought it was ISS (ISS is not in this location)
